src_text: Isitatimende Senqubomgomo Yesabelomali Sesikhathi Esimaphakathi (i-MTBPS) IKhabhinethi lamukela i-MTBPS yokuqala kaNgqongqoshe Wezezimali uTito Mboweni, ebesisuselwa enkolelweni enkulu yokuthi iNingizimu Afrika ingavuselelw I-MTBPS yowezi-2018 icaphuna ubunzima uhulumeni abhekene nabo ezinqumweni okumele azithathe kwezomnotho kanye nakwimali kahulumeni eminyakeni emithathu ezay Ukukhula kwezomnotho konyaka wezi-2018 kubuyekeziwe kwasuka ku- kwaya ku-, futhi isimo somhlaba jikelele siqhubeka nokuba nezingqinamba kwezomnotho emazweni asafufus I-MTBPS yowezi-2018 iqalisa ukusimamisa kanye nohlelo lukahulumeni lokuvusesela nokugqugquzela ukusimama komnotho, oluzosekelwa uzinzo lwesikhwamamali sikahulumeni kanye nolwezimal
trg_text: Medium Term Budget Policy Statement (MTBPS) Cabinet welcomes the maiden MTBPS by Finance Minister Tito Mboweni, which is based on the strong conviction that South Africa can be renewe The 2018 MTBPS highlights the difficult economic and fiscal choices confronting government over the next three year Economic growth for 2018 has been revised down from

src_text: Uhulumeni uqhubeka nokuzibophezela ekusimamiseni isikhawamamali sikahulumeni, kodwa kube nokuchezuka okuncane selokhu sethulwa kuSabelomali sowezi-2018 kuNhlolanja kulo nyak Uhulumeni uyaqhubeka nokuzibophezela ekuzinziseni nasekwehliseni isikweletu sezwNjengoba kuncipha umthwalo osindayo kwezomnotho kanye nasesimweni sesikhwamamali sikahulumeni, ukwahlukaniswa kwengeniso okuphakanyiswayo kuyaqhubeka nokubeka eqhulwini izinhlelo zokusebenzisa imali emphakathini njengemfundo eyisisekelo, ezempilo, ezenhlalakahle, amanzi, ukuthuthwa kwendle kanye nezinsiza zikagesi Ingqungquthela Yezempilo KaMongameli
trg_text: to , and the global environment remains challenging for emerging market economie The 2018 MTBPS gives effect to the President s growth economic stimulus and recovery plan, which will be underpinned by fiscal and monetary stabilit Government remains committed to fiscal sustainability, but there has been slippage since the tabling of the 2018 Budget in February this yea Government remains committed to stabilizing and bringing down deb Against the backdrop of a difficult economic and fiscal environment, the proposed division of revenue continues to prioritise large social spending programmes that support basic education, health, social welfare, water, sanitation and electricity services Presidential Health Summit Cabinet welcomes the outcomes of the Presidential Health Summit which aim to address the various challenges facing the public health syste The outcomes will strengthen the preparations for the implementation of the National Health Insurance

src_text: IKhabhinethi lamukela imiphumela yeNgqungquthela Yezempilo KaMongameli ehlose ukudingida izinselele ezinhlobonhlobo eziqondene nohlelo lwezempilo lomphakath Imiphumela izoqinisa amalungiselelo okuqalisa uMshwalense Wezempilo Kazwelonke (i-NHI) Uguquko kwezomhlaba IKhabhinethi lamukela ukuqaliswa kwezinhlelo zoguquko nokubuyiselwa komhlaba eziqhutshwa ngokulinganayo eziqondene nemisebenzi nokungalungi kwesikhathi esedlule futhi lisiza ukukhulisa umnoth UMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa uhole umcimbi wokubuyiswa komhlaba, lapho kunikezelwe ngamahektha ayizi-4 586 omhlaba emphakathini waKwaMkhwanazi eMpangeni, KwaZulu-Natal
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Children s Amendment Bill in the Government Gazette for public comment The Bill seeks to strengthen coordination of the child-care and protection system through interdepartmental and intersectoral collaboratio The amendments respond to the North Gauteng High Court Judgement of November 2017, wherein the Department of Social Development was ordered to prepare and introduce the necessary amendments to the Children s Act, 2005 (Act 38 of 2005) in respect to the legal solution towards the management of the foster-care syste Cabinet approved the introduction of the Postal Services Amendment Bill to Parliamen The Bill gives effect to the National Integrated ICT Policy White Paper that was approved by Cabinet in September 2016.The intended outcomes are to have a competitive, viable and sustainable South African Post Office that provides/facilitates universal services and access as well as the transformation of the postal secto The Bill also provides an approach to assigning physical addresses to rural and traditional communitieThis Bill has already gone through public consultatio Upcoming events13.

src_text: Umphakathi waKwaMkhwanazi uzothola nezabelo ezilandela ukubuyiswa komhlaba kanye nokwesekwa okuzowusiza usebenzise yonke ingcebo ongase uyithole kulowa mhlab Lokhu kushintsha imiphakathi esebenzela ukuziphilisa ibambe iqhaza kwezohwebo futhi ibe ngabanikazi bamabhizinisi kuyo yonke imisebenzi evela kwezolimo kanye nengcebo engatholakala emhlabeni wab Uhulumeni uzinikele ekwesekeni ukusimamiswa kwamabhizinisi ezolimo aqubukayo, okubandakanya imisebenzi engama-262 ehambisana nokuguqulwa komhlaba ukuze kuhlomule intsha kanye nabantu besifazane kuzo zonke izifundazwe Ukubhidlizwa kwengqalasizinda yomphakathiIKhabhinethi lidlulise ukukhathazeka ngokubhidlizwa kwengqalasizinda yezokuthuth Lokhu kubukela phansi ukuzibophezela kukahulumeni ekuhambiseni izinsiza emiphakathini eyayiphucwe amathuba ngaphambilin Ayikho intukuthelo engasetshenziswa njengesizathu sokubhidliza impahla yomphakath Lokhu kubhidlizwa kwempahla kuphuca abampofu inqwaba yezinsiza eziyizidingongqang IKhabhinethi linxusa amalungu omphakathi ukuthi aqaphele futhi asebenzisane nezinhlaka zomthetho ukuze labo abaphula umthetho babhekana nengalo yomtheth IKhabhinethi liphinde laveza ukuthi iQoqwana Lezobulungiswa, Ukuvikelwa Kobugebengu Nezokuvikela lizobhekana kanjani nalolu daba ngokufanel

trg_text: National Director of Public Prosecutions (NDPP) appointment process Cabinet welcomed the new approach of appointing the NDP President Ramaphosa appointed the Advisory Panel to identify and conduct interviews with individuals worthy of consideration to occupy the position of the Head of the National Prosecuting Authorit The panel convened for the first time this week and is expected to submit shortlisted names to the President by 7 December 2018.

src_text: Isinqumo Senkantolo YoMthethosisekeloIKhabhinethi lenze izethulo ngeSinqumo Senkantolo yoMthethosisekelo esiqondene nokusetshenziswa, ukulinywa nokuphathwa kwensangu ngabantu abadala ngasese bezisebenzisele ngokwabo kanye nomthelela wak Kucelwa ukuthi amalungu omphakathi azijwayeze lesi sinqumo njengoba ukusetshenziswa kwensangu emphakathini kungavumelekil Phezu kwalokho, lesi sinqumo asikuqedanga ukuba yicala kokudayiswa kwensangIKhabhinethi lazisa ukuthi lesi sinqumo sisebenza phakathi kweminye imithetho engase isebenze maqondana nokusebenzisa, ukuphatha kanye nokutshala insang IKhabhinethi lisabonisana nongoti ngalolu daba INgqungquthela Yezokuphepha Ezikoleni IKhabhinethi lamukela iNgqungquthela Yezokuphepha Ezikoleni esanda kubanjwa ngaphansi kobuholi bukaNgqongqoshe Wezemfundo Eyisisekelo u-Angie Motshekg Le ngqungquthela ihlanganise ababambiqhaza kwezemfundo nabazimele ukuthola izisombululo ngezinkinga zezokuphepha eziqondene nezikole ezweni kanye nokusungula indlela ebheke phambili yokwakha izimo eziphephile esikolen Lokhu kulandela izigameko zodlame ezehle ezikoleni ezithile, okubandakanya ukubulawa ngesihluku kukathisha oneminyaka engama-24, uMn Gadimang Daniel Mokolobate, owabulawa ukugwazwa umfundi eRamotshere Secondary School eZeerust, eNyakatho Ntshonalang Bonke ababambiqhaza bavuma ukuthi udlame jikelele, ikakhulukazi ezikoleni, alwamukelekile nhlobo nokuthi kudingeka kuqhutshekwe nokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izikole ziba yindawo ephephile kubafundi nothisha Izivivinyo zikamatikuletsheni
trg_text: Constitutional Court JudgementCabinet deliberated on the Constitutional Court Judgement on the use, cultivation and possession of cannabis by an adult person in private for his/her personal consumption and its impac Members of the public are requested to familiarise themselves with the judgement as the use of cannabis in a public place is prohibite Furthermore, the judgement did not decriminalise the dealing in cannabiCabinet acknowledges that the judgement exists in the context of other laws which may be applicable to the use, possession and cultivation of cannabi

src_text: IKhabhinethi lifisela bonke abafundi, ikakhulukazi abafundi beBanga le-12, okumhlophe kulesi sikhath Okokuqala ngqa, kulo nyaka uMnyango uzoba nesivivinyo sokuhlolela uLimi Lwezimpawu lwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) ezingeni loLimi Lwasekhaya esizobhalwa abafundi abangama-58 abangezwa kahle
trg_text: Cabinet is taking advice on the matter School Safety Summit Cabinet welcomes the recently held School Safety Summit hosted under the leadership of Basic Education Minister Angie Motshekg The summit brought together education and external stakeholders to find solutions to safety issues facing the country s schools as well as to pave the way forward for safer environments in school This follows incidents of violence at some schools, including the tragic death of the 24-year-old teacher, Mr Gadimang Daniel Mokolobate, who was fatally stabbed by a learner at the Ramotshere Secondary School in Zeerust, North Wes All stakeholders agreed that violence in general, and in schools in particular, is not acceptable and that further cooperation is required to ensure that schools become safer for both learners and teachers Matric exams Cabinet wishes all learners, especially Grade 12 learners, well over this perio For the first time, the department will this year also administer an examination in South African Sign Language at Home Language level to 58 deaf candidates across 10 school The examination extends over five-and-a-half weeks and will conclude on 28 Novembe Learners across the country will also sign a voluntary pledge to commit to upholding the integrity of the examinations by not participating in any malpractic Parents and guardians are encouraged to support learners during this critical period in their academic journe It is also vital to motivate learners to finish their schoolin Cabinet decisions9.

trg_text: This coincides with the Cabinet Programme of Action Reporting Wee The Imbizo Focus Week will provide a platform for members of the National Executive as well as provincial and local government leaders to undertake community meetings and Izimbizo countrywide, over this period, to demonstrate government s implementation of the 2014-2019 Medium Term Strategic Framework and to respond to issues being raised by citizens, which impact on the safety, growth and development of our communitieThe two weeks of activism takes place against the backdrop of celebrations of the centenaries of Struggle icons Mama Albertina Sisulu and Tata Nelson Mandela, both of whom epitomised the value of regular consultation and interaction with the communities they serve

src_text: Umhlomulo womsebenzi ongenzelwe, phakathi kokunye, uzovumela ukuqhubeka kokuthuthukiswa kwezokuvakasha okuqondene nezemvelo kanye nokukhuthazwa kokufinyelela ezinsizeni zabadobi abadobela ukuziphilisa eziphethwe ngendlela esimamisay Imisebenzi ehlongozwayo yazalwa izingxoxo zokubonisana nababambiqhaza abafanel Ama-MPA azoshicilelwa kuSomqulu Kahulumen IKhabhinethi ligunyaze uHlelo Lwemisebenzi Kazwelonke (i-NAP) Yesibili Olubuyekeziwe Noluhambisanayo lweNingizimu Afrika ukuNqanda Ukwanda Kwezindawo Eziwugwadule, Ukumoshakala Komhlaba kanye Nokungenelela kuMthelela Wesomiso (2018-2030).
trg_text: German Business and the Compact with Africa (CwA) Countries, and a Business Roundtable, both of which will be held in Berlin, Germany on 30 October 2018.The G20 Investment Summit will bring together German business and CwA Countries to explore investment opportunities under the framework of the G20 Partnership with Afric German investors will present flagship projects currently undertaken in the CwA Countries and explore further opportunities on the continen The President will attend the summit in the capacity of Co-Chair of the G20 Africa Advisory GrouThe G20 Conference on the CwA will focus on ways in which the G20, African countries and development institutions can cooperate to promote private investment and economic participation in African state The meeting will also undertake preparatory work in this field for the G20 Summit in Buenos Aires, Argentin National Imbizo Focus WeekMembers of the Executive will participate in the GCIS s 9th National Imbizo Focus Week of the fifth democratic administration, which will take place from 12 to 25 November 2018.

trg_text: The NAP seeks to contribute towards the conservation and sustainable use of our land and other natural resourceSouth Africa ratified the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification in 1997.

src_text: Lezi zichibiyelo zilandela iSinqumo Senkantolo Ephakeme yaseNyakatho Gauteng sakuLwezi 2017, lapho uMnyango Wezokuthuthukiswa Komphakathi wayalelwa ukuthi ulungise futhi wethule izichibiyelo ezidingekayo zoMthetho Wezingane, wezi-2005 (uMthetho 38 wezi-2005) maqondana nesisombululo sezomthetho esiqondene nokuphathwa kohlelo lokukhuliswa kwezingane ngabantu abangazizal IKhabhinethi lagunyaza ukwethulwa koMthethosivivinywa Oyisichibiyelo Wezinsizakalo Zeposi ePhalamend Lo Mthethosivivinyo uqalisa uMthetho Odingidwayo WeNqubomgomo Edidiyele Kuzwelonke Yolwazi Lwezobuchwepheshe Kwezokuxhumana (i-ICT) owagunyazwa iKhabhinethi kuMandulo 2016.Imiphumela okuphokophelwe kuyo wukuba yiPosi LaseNingizimu Afrika elinomsebenzi wokubhekana nomncintiswano, elisebenzayo nelisimeme futhielilawula yonke imisebenzi yeposi nengafinyelela kubo bonke abantu kanye nokuguqulwa komkhakha wezepos UMthethosivivinyo uhlinzeka ngendlela yokunika imiphakathi yasemakhaya neqhuba izinqubo zesintu amakheli asemakhay Lo Mthethosivivinyo sewudlulile esigabeni sokubonisana nomphakath Imicimbi Ezayo13.
trg_text: Cabinet congratulates the Minister of Health, Dr Aaron Motsoaledi, who received two prestigious Kochon prizes, at an award ceremony held at The Hague, The Netherland The first prize is in the Minister s individual capacity for his role and political leadership in the fight against tuberculosis (TB) globallThe second prize, which the Minister will share with the Right Honourable Nick Hebert, Member of Parliament (MP) in the United Kingdom, will be in their capacity as co-chairs of the Global TB Caucus of MPs from all over the worl The Kochon Prize is awarded annually to individuals and/or organisations that have made a significant contribution to combating TB either in their countries or globall Cabinet welcomes the World Travel Awards 2018 which voted South Africa as Africa s Leading Destinatio Durban in KwaZulu-Natal was also recognised as Africa s Leading City Destination and scooped the prestigious title of Africa s Leading Cruise Por Cape Town, in the Western Cape landed the title of Africa s Leading Festival and Event Destinatio Cabinet welcomes the premiering of a local film titled Nommer 37 by film-maker Joshua Bradley in the United States on 2 November 2018.

src_text: Ingqungquthela yaMazwe Angamashumi Amabili (i-G20)UMongameli Ramaphosa umenywe uNdunankulu wase-Germany, uDk Angela Merkel, ukuthi abambe iqhaza eNgqungqutheleni yoTshalomali ye-G20 - Amabhizinisi ase-German kanye naMazwe Angamalunga Esivumelwano ne-Afrika (i-CwA), kanye noMhlangano Wezamabhizinisi, zombili ezizobanjelwa e-Berlin, eGermany mhla zingama-30 kuMfumfu 2018.
trg_text: Mtshaliat the passing of ANC stalwart Moss Chikan Mr Chikane became an MP in 1994 after the country's first democratic election In 2005, he was appointed as South Africa s Ambassador to Germanyto the people of Sweden as well as the family of Lisbet Palme

src_text: Ingqungquthela Yotshalomali ye-G20 izohlanganisa amabhizinisi ase-German namazwe e-CwA ukuhlola amathuba otshalomali ngaphansi kohlaka lokuHlanganyela kwe-G20 ne-Afrik Abatshalimali base-German bazokwethula imisebenzi eyaziwa ngayo eqhutshwa emaZweni ama-CwA futhi kubhekwe namanye amathuba ezwenikaz UMongameli uzohambela ingqungquthela esikhundleni sakhe njengoSihlalo Obambisene Nomunye eThimbeni lase-Afrika Lokweluleka i-G20.Ingqungquthela ye-G20 nge-CwA izogxila endleleni i-G20, amazwe ase-Afrika nezikhungo zentuthuko angabambisana ngayo ukukhuthaza utshalomali lomkhakha ozimele kanye nokubamba iqhaza kwezomnotho zamazwe ase-Afrik Lo mhlangano uzophinde wenze umsebenzi wokulungiselela lo mkhakha iNgqungquthela ye-G20 ezoba se-Buenos Aires, e-Argentin 15.

src_text: IKhabhinethi lihalalisela uNgqongqoshe Wezempilo, uDk Aaron Motsoaledi, othole imiklomelo emikhulu emibili ye-Kochon, emcimbini wokuklomelisa ngezindondo obubanjwe e-The Hague, e-The Netherland Umklomelo wokuqala uwuthole esikhundleni sakhe uqobo uNgqongqoshe ngeqhaza lakhe nobuholi kwezepolitiki ekulweni nesifo sofuba (i-TB) emhlabeni jikelel Umklomelo wesibili, uNgqongqoshe abambisene noMhlonishwa Omkhulu u-Nick Hebert, iLungu lePhalamende (i-MP) e-United Kingdom, ezikhundleni zabo zokubambisana ngokuba wosihlalo be-Global TB Causus yama-MP asemhlabeni wonk UMklomelo we-Kochon kuklonyeliswa ngawo minyaka yonke kubantu ngabodwana noma nezinhlangano ezibe negalelo elikhulu ekunqandeni i-TB ezweni labo noma emhlabeni jikelel 17.

src_text: IKhabhinethi lamukela ama-World Travel Awards wezi-2018 lapho kwavotelwa iNingizimu Afrika njengeNdawo Yokuvakasha Ephuma phambil Indawo yase-Durban KwaZulu-Natali yaziswa njengeDolobha Eliphuma phambili e-Afrika Kwezokuvakasha yase ithola isicoco sokuthi iCheba Lokungcebeleka Eliholayo e-Afrik IKapa, eNtsholanga Kapa lithole isicoco sokuba Indawo Ephuma Phambili e-Afrika Kwezemibhiyozo Nemicimb IKhabhinethi lamukele ukubukwa okokuqala e-United States mhla zi-2 kuLwezi 2018 kwefilimu lala ekhaya elibizwa ngokuthi Nommer 37 elenziwe ngumqophimafilimu uJoshua Bradle Le filimu ekhuluma ngobugebengu eqoshelwe eCape Flats yaxhaswa uMnyango Wezohwebo Nezezimboni ngohlelo i-South African Emerging Black Filmmakers Incentiv Lokhu kuzoba negalelo ekuheheni utshalomalingqo olubuya kumazwe angaphandle lungena embonini yezamafilimu yaseNingizimu AfrikAmazwi Enduduzo19.

src_text: IKhabhinethi lihlanganyela noMongameli Ramaphosa ukudlulisa ubuhlungu namazwi enduduzo: 1 ngokudlula kabuhlungu kwabantu abangaphezu kwama-27, ezingozini zezimoto eziningi ku-N1 North eLimpop Abasebenzisi bomgwaqo banxushwa ukuthi baqaphele emigwaqweni yethu futhi kumele baqinisekise ukuthi bathobela imithetho yomgwaqo ngaso sonke isikhathigokudlula emhlabeni kweqhawe loMzabalazo, uMama Agnes Msiman
trg_text: Cabinet approved South Africa s Revised and Aligned Second National Action Programme (NAP) to Combat Desertification, Land Degradation and Mitigate the Effects of Drought (2018-2030).

src_text: UMama Msimang wayezibophezele ekubeni isishoshovu sezobulili kanye nePhini likaMongameli we-African National Congress (i-ANC) Women's Leagu Ubengomunye wabantu besifazane abaningi abanxenxa imiphakathi eNingizimu Afrika iyonke ukuthi balwisane nombuso wobandlulul Uzofihlwa ngoLwesihlanu, mhla zingama-26 kuMfumf Inkonzo yomgcwabo izoqala ngelesi-08:00 e-Our Lady Cedars Catholic Church eWoodmead, eGolingokudlula kweqhawe loMzabalazo futhi elamukeliswa indondo, i-National Order of Mendi for Bravery in Silver, uMn Eric "Stalin" Mtshalingokudlula kweqhawe le-ANC uMoss Chikan UMn Chikane waba yi-MP ngowe-1994 emuva kokhetho lwezwe lwentando yeningi labantu lokuqal Ngowe-2005, waqokwa njengeNxusa leseNingizimu Afrika e-Germanykubantu base-Sweden kanye nomndeni kaNks Lisbet Palme, oneminyaka engama-87, odlulil UNks Palme wayengumfelokazi kaNdunankulu wase-Sweden u-Olof Palme owabulawa ngowe-1986 futhi uMongameli Ramaphosa amchaza ngokuthi "uMngane waseNingizimu Afrika".
